comments.body:
- `Find the example here:` -> `Find full example code here:` - We don't need a special CSS style to change font size. Use `
...
`.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -38,7 +38,15 @@ def render(context)
       code = File.open(@file).read.encode("UTF-8")
       code = select_lines(code)
  
-      Pygments.highlight(code, :lexer => @lang)
+      rendered_code = Pygments.highlight(code, :lexer => @lang)
+
+      spark_version = site.config['SPARK_VERSION_SHORT']
+      hint = "<div class=\"hint\">Find the example here: " \

comments.body: Could you make a JIRA so we remember to fix the issue with links not working before a branch is cut? We don't have to do it in this PR.

comments.body: Do you mean we use spark/tree/master instead of spark/tree/v1.6 for now? Then we change it to v1.6 after cutting the branch out?
